commit message:
Convert line endings from CRLF to LF.

+ No code change introduced here!

Merge pull request #6 from johnjohndoe/fix-line-endings

Convert line endings from CRLF to LF.

Avoid committing IDE specific files.

+ These files are subject to change on different computers
and should therefore not be checked into version control.
+ Removing them will most likely force you to **reimport the project**
once again into Android Studio.

Merge pull request #7 from johnjohndoe/exclude-ide-specific-files

Avoid committing IDE specific files.
Remove attributes without effect on layout.
Use design time layout attributes to show values in preview window.
Use speaking resource identifier and variable names.

Merge pull request #8 from johnjohndoe/minor-cleanup

Minor cleanup
